MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir or Madam: 
 
  
 
Given that theplanet.com is the ISP for the above captioned web site,
please find our Notice of Claimed Infringement set forth below.  
 
  
 
Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter.  
 
Very truly yours,  
 
DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC  
 
/James R. Duby, Jr. / 
 
James R. Duby, Jr. 
 
3511 Coolidge Road, Suite 200
East Lansing, MI 48823
517-371-9835 - DD
517-371-9840 - FAX
Jim@Dubylaw.com  
 
CONFIDENTIAL AND PRIVILEGED: The information contained in this message
(including any attachments) may be attorney client privileged and
confidential information solely for use by the intended recipient. This
message is for contact purposes only and does not constitute an
electronic signature or an intent to contract. If the reader of this
message is not the intended recipient, the reader is notified that any
use, dissemination, distribution or copying of the communication is
strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error,
please immediately notify DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC by telephone at
517-371-9835. 
 
FEDERAL TAX NOTICE: In accordance with the Department of Treasury
Circular 230, please be advised that any statements contained herein
(including any attachments hereto) are not intended to be used, and may
not be used by you or any other person, for the purpose of avoiding
penalties that may be imposed under federal tax law. 
 
  
 
  _____   
 
From: James R. Duby, Jr. [mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com]
Sent: Tuesday, January 02, 2007 3:07 PM
To: 'alerts@binnews.com' 
Subject: FW: Notice of Claimed Infringement 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
  _____   
 
From: James R. Duby, Jr. [mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com]  
Sent: Tuesday, January 02, 2007 3:05 PM 
To: 'alertsREMOVE@MEbinnews.com' 
Subject: Notice of Claimed Infringement 
 
  
 
DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC 
 
  
 
ATTORNEYS 
 
  
 
3511 COOLIDGE ROAD 
 
  
 
SUITE 200 
 
  
 
EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN 48823 
 
  
 
(517) 371-9835 
 
  
 
FAX (517) 371-9840 
 
  
 
E-MAIL  <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> Jim@Dubylaw.com 
 
  
 
January 2, 2007 
 
  
 
Joe Morganelli 
 
Designated Agent at Binnews 
 
12724 Spring Run 
 
Clermont, FL 34711 
 
  
 
RE: NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK 
 
 INFRINGEMENT OF TECHSMITH CORPORATION 
 
 SNAGIT SOFTWARE PROGRAM 
 
  
 
  
 
Dear Mr. Morganelli:   
 
  
 
1.        Please be advised that we are intellectual property counsel for 
TechSmith Corporation, of 2405 Woodlake Drive, Okemos, MI, U.S.A. 48864,
who 
is the owner of the copyrights in and to its SNAGIT 8.0 and 8.1 software

programs and the owner of the U.S. federally registered mark SNAGIT,
Reg. 
No. 2,104,800 and EU Reg. No. 2068591.   
 
  
 
2.        We have good faith belief that your site
<http://www.binnews.com/> 
www.binnews.com and more specifically located at 
<http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247> 
http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247  currently is 
using/posting of an unauthorized links, key codes and downloads to
TechSmith 
Corporation's SNAGIT program and related mark. 
 
  
 
3.        TechSmith Corporation has publicly distributed its SNAGIT 
copyrightable software program under its federally registered mark
SNAGIT 
since at least February 19, 1991 and worldwide thereafter and
specifically 
the European Union under its EU registered mark SNAGIT.  For a full 
description of TechSmith Corporation's SNAGIT software program and
related 
products go to  <http://www.techsmith.com/> www.techsmith.com.   
 
  
 
4.        The infringing SNAGIT program and/or links and downloads may  be

accessed, without TechSmith Corporation's permission, in a manner which
is 
outside the scope of its license agreement for the SNAGIT program at 
<http://www.binnews.com/> www.binnews.com and more specifically located
at 
<http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247> 
http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247. 
 
  
 
5.         Please contact us on behalf of the Complaining Party TechSmith 
Corporation as authorized under the attached executed TechSmith
Corporation 
Power of Attorney: 
 
  
 
DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC 
 
James R. Duby, Jr. 
 
3511 Coolidge Road, Suite 200 
 
East Lansing, MI  48823 
 
517-371-9835 - DD Phone 
 
517-371-9840 - Fax 
 
 <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> Jim@Dubylaw.com 
 
Intellectual Property Counsel for TechSmith Corporation 
 
  
 
6.        Please use this Notice of Copyright and Trademark Infringement
to 
take all steps necessary to remove and/or block access to the infringing

SNAGIT program and/or links, key codes and downloads located on the 
<http://www.binnews.com/> www.binnews.com and more specifically located
at 
<http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247> 
http://www.binnews.com/news/extend.php?n=2000246247. 
 
  
 
7.   The statements contained herein are accurate and we are authorized
to 
act on behalf of the copyright and trademark owner TechSmith 
Corporation, said statements being made under penalty of perjury.   
 
  
 
Very truly yours, 
 
  
 
DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC 
 
  
 
/James R. Duby, Jr./ 
 
  
 
James R. Duby, Jr.
